ResourceHeader.ResourceName: ACE Electron Proton Alpha Monitor (EPAM) Ephemeris Data, Hourly Averages

RevisionEvent.Note: Only known prior ReleaseDate of the metadata

Added DOI and PublicationInfo, updated the DataProducer Person to Dennis Hagerty by JMW 2022-06-02, nine Parameter Description typos corrected, metadata updated to SPASE 2.4.1, reviewed by LFB 20220724

Updated PublishedBy name to match ROR Registry. Added ResourceType and NamingAuthority. Changed http to https in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Fixed version number separator in top-level schemaLocation attribute. Matched version number in schemaLocation attribute to updated value in Version tag. ZCB

ResourceHeader.Description: Hourly-averaged ephemeris data for the ACE spacecraft, Earth, and Jupiter. Also included are the orientation of the ACE spin-axis, and a rotation matrix for transforming from HEE cartisian coordinates to RTN coordinates.
ResourceHeader.Acknowledgement: Thomas P. Armstrong, Fundamental Technologies LLC

PublicationInfo.Authors: Gold, R. E., Roelof, E. C., Krimigis, S., Haggerty, D., Armstrong, T., Manweiler, J. W., and Patterson, J. D.

InformationURL.Name: Explanation of EPAM print-groups and CSV file nomenclature.
InformationURL.Description: The Explanation HTML page at Fundamental Technologies describes how the numeric data from the ACE EPAM instrument are divided into different print-groups, the nomenclature of the ASCII-based comma-separated variable (CSV) files, and how those files can be accessed.

AccessInformation.Acknowledgement: Thomas P. Armstrong, Fundamental Technologies LLC

Parameter.Name: Time for the record
Parameter.Description: Time for the record given in year, day of year, hour, min, and decimal seconds. The given time represents the beginning of the averaging interval.

Parameter.Name: Spacecraft X Component
Parameter.Description: X-Coordinate of the spacecraft location in HEE coordinates from the predicted Supplimental Experimenter Data Record (SEDR)

Parameter.Name: Spacecraft Y Component
Parameter.Description: Y-Coordinate of the spacecraft location in HEE coordinates from the predicted Supplimental Experimenter Data Record (SEDR)

Parameter.Name: Spacecraft Z Component
Parameter.Description: Z-Coordinate of the spacecraft location in HEE coordinates from the predicted Supplimental Experimenter Data Record (SEDR)

Parameter.Name: Earth X Component
Parameter.Description: X-Coordinate of the Earth in HEE coordinates from the predicted Supplimental Experimenter Data Record (SEDR)

Parameter.Name: Earth Y Component
Parameter.Description: Y-Coordinate of the Earth in HEE coordinates from the predicted Supplimental Experimenter Data Record (SEDR)

Parameter.Name: Earth Z Component
Parameter.Description: Z-Coordinate of the Earth in HEE coordinates from the predicted Supplimental Experimenter Data Record (SEDR)

Parameter.Name: Jupiter X Component
Parameter.Description: X-Coordinate of Jupiter in HEE coordinates from the predicted Supplimental Experimenter Data Record (SEDR)

Parameter.Name: Jupiter Y Component
Parameter.Description: Y-Coordinate of Jupiter in HEE coordinates from the predicted Supplimental Experimenter Data Record (SEDR)

Parameter.Name: Jupiter Z Component
Parameter.Description: Z-Coordinate of Jupiter in HEE coordinates from the predicted Supplimental Experimenter Data Record (SEDR)

Parameter.Name: Starting Spin-Axis Longitude
Parameter.Description: Longitude of the spacecraft spin-axis in HEE coordinates at the beginning of the time interval.

Parameter.Name: Starting Spin-Axis Latitude
Parameter.Description: Latitude of the spacecraft spin-axis in HEE coordinates at the beginning of the time interval.

Parameter.Name: Starting Spin-Axis Longitude Uncertainty
Parameter.Description: Uncertainty in the longitude of the spacecraft spin-axis in HEE coordinates at the beginning of the time interval.

Parameter.Name: Starting Spin-Axis Latitude Uncertainty
Parameter.Description: Uncertainty in the latitude of the spacecraft spin-axis in HEE coordinates at the beginning of the time interval.

Parameter.Name: Ending Spin-Axis Longitude
Parameter.Description: Longitude of the spacecraft spin-axis in HEE coordinates at the end of the time interval.

Parameter.Name: Ending Spin-Axis Latitude
Parameter.Description: Latitude of the spacecraft spin-axis in HEE coordinates at the end of the time interval.

Parameter.Name: Ending Spin-Axis Longitude Uncertainty
Parameter.Description: Uncertainty in the longitude of the spacecraft spin-axis in HEE coordinates at the end of the time interval.

Parameter.Name: Ending Spin-Axis Latitude Uncertainty
Parameter.Description: Uncertainty in the latitude of the spacecraft spin-axis in HEE coordinates at the end of the time interval.

Parameter.Name: Payload to RTN Rotation Operator Element a11
Parameter.Description: Row 1, Column 1 of the Payload to RTN rotation operator.

Parameter.Name: Payload to RTN Rotation Operator Element a12
Parameter.Description: Row 1, Column 2 of the Payload to RTN rotation operator.

Parameter.Name: Payload to RTN Rotation Operator Element a13
Parameter.Description: Row 1, Column 3 of the Payload to RTN rotation operator.

Parameter.Name: Payload to RTN Rotation Operator Element a21
Parameter.Description: Row 2, Column 1 of the Payload to RTN rotation operator.

Parameter.Description: Row 2, Column 2 of the Payload to RTN rotation operator.

Parameter.Name: Payload to RTN Rotation Operator Element a23
Parameter.Description: Row 2, Column 3 of the Payload to RTN rotation operator.

Parameter.Description: Row 3, Column 1 of the Payload to RTN rotation operator.

Parameter.Name: Payload to RTN Rotation Operator Element a32
Parameter.Description: Row 3, Column 2 of the Payload to RTN rotation operator.

Parameter.Name: Payload to RTN Rotation Operator Element a33
Parameter.Description: Row 3, Column 3 of the Payload to RTN rotation operator.
